title: ExoTerra gains flight heritage for Halo thrusters
summary: ExoTerra Resources has demonstrated its first Halo Hall-effect thrusters in orbit on DARPA Blackjack satellites.

title: Funded for further growth, Leaf Space prepares its ground station network for the upcoming SpaceX’s Transporter-9 mission and shares excitement for the sector
summary: As recently announced by Leaf Space, the Italian company has now secured EUR 20M (USD 22M) in Series B funding, positioning itself among the world’s leading Ground Segment-as-a-Service (GSaaS) providers. […]

title: Busek lauds on-orbit performance of OneWeb’s Hall-effect thrusters
summary: In-space propulsion specialist Busek said that more than 100 of the company’s BHT-350 Hall-effect thrusters are operating in orbit on OneWeb communications satellites.

title: KSAT unveils automated Ka-band network
summary: KSAT is establishing an automated Ka-band ground network for small satellite constellations

title: Billionaire Charlie Ergen merging Dish and EchoStar to expand mobile and satellite telecom empire
summary: Billionaire Charlie Ergen is consolidating his telecom empire, merging his companies DISH Network and EchoStar in an all-stock deal.
